quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine. – Roy T. Bennett
fact: The only real person to ever to appear on a pez dispenser was Betsy Ross.
joke: Why did the A go to the bathroom and come out as an E? Because he had a vowel movement.
